description: Aiko finds that his sexual encounters are a reality. Aiko goes to take a bath and walks in one one of his six beautiful servants bathing herself. This startles him, causing him to slip and fall, and unlock the pent-up sexual frustration within him. He begins to have wild sex with her. Will this awaken the other five servants needs to get as much cock as possible and turn them into his filthy little whores?
title: Maids in Dream Volume II: The Awakening
